description: Machine-readable Key Statistics summaries injected per asset via GEOKeyTakeaways component
format: Each asset page renders 3 factual bullet points: definition, market influencers, simulator value

seed_assets.definition: Bitcoin (BTC) — Digital Gold. A decentralized store of value with a capped supply of 21 million coins.
seed_assets.influencers: Cryptocurrency influenced by network adoption, regulatory developments, and broader digital asset sentiment.
seed_assets.simulator_value: TradeHQ lets you practice BTC trading with $10,000 virtual capital, real-time charts, and AI mentoring.
